data.text: @theunbeliever69 Thanks for letting us know, Pee. I would recommend clearing your cookies and cache from your browser. I hope that helps. Thanks - Bree
@Bonzamaaate Hi @Bonzamaaate, the use of masks is mandatory on all flights and in all airports across Australia, except where a medical exemption exists. Thanks- Jen

data.text: @mikeredes Hi @mikeredes, our website is up and running at the time. May I know what is the specific error you encountered? You may also send us a DM if you need further assistance. We'd be happy to help. Thanks - Norine
@Ceemonki Hi Phill, sorry to hear about the flight change. We'd like to look into this further. Could you please send us a DM with your booking reference and full name? Thanks - Leslie
@Peytonflemingg Hi Peyton, thanks for reaching us out. Sorry to hear about this. If you require any assistance with your booking, please DM us and we’d be happy to help. Thanks – Vi

@william03171356 We’d like to look into this for you, William – as we’re usually really proud of the experience we provide our customers. Could you please send us a DM to speak with someone from the team? Thanks– Jen
@vii_lauren Hi Lauren, sorry for any confusion. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Jaya
@ellie_sutcliffe Hi Ellie, I appreciate that you'd like an extension of your voucher. We'd like to look into this for you. Would you mind sending us a DM? Thanks - Leslie

@kathyrichardson Hi, the use of masks is mandatory on all flights and airports across AU except where a medical exemption exists. We have escalated your concern to management to follow up with our relevant team to ensure team members are adhering to the correct requirements at all times. – Leslie

data.text: @martinuslukas Hi Marten, thanks for reaching out. You need to check with the relevant gov't authority regarding entry restrictions to ensure you meet the criteria for entry prior to travelling. You can also check https://t.co/v1E37ieZpU for more info about requirements per country. - Norine

data.text: @christeeny_j Hi Christine. We know travel might be a little tricky right now and we're reviewing our network to see how we can improve. You may check our available flights on our website(https://t.co/GAmZRDYKic) and travel alerts page(https://t.co/zaG2Ce1PBA) for updates. Thanks - Jay

data.text: @ahmeeka Hi Amika, thanks for reaching out. Yes, you can purchase an additional checked baggage allowance on Manage Booking here - https://t.co/FRUYDSgDkm. Thanks - Leslie

@becvandyk Hi @becvandyk, I appreciate how upsetting it can be to have to pay for an excess baggage fee. We limit carry on to 7kgs in total for each passenger including things like handbags – so if your carry-on is over the weight limit, you'll need to pay an excess baggage fee. - Jaya

data.text: @madair62 We’re so glad our staff was on-hand to help make your experience with us a great one, Michele. We’ll definitely pass on the feedback (I’m sure it’ll make their day!) Thanks – Jen
@Romaannooo Hi there, thanks for reaching out. We don’t have an email address but you can send us a DM here and we’ll help you out. Thanks - Vi

@Nath_Holt Hi Nath, I appreciate you were trying to cancel your booking. A credit voucher option depends on your ticket's fare rules. This may be an option if your flight gets cancelled or affected by border restriction changes. Just feel free to send us a DM if you need more help - Bree

@markwilko75 Hi Mark, we've extended credit vouchers issued as a result of COVID-19 disruptions to have an expiry month of December 2022. You can find out more by visiting - https://t.co/pJEJWfuSYq. If you require any assistance, please DM us and we’d be happy to help. Thanks – Vi

urls.title: Travel Alerts | Jetstar
urls.description: Chat with one of our friendly Jetstar customer service

data.text: @Pedropavezart Hi Pedro, sorry to hear about your experience. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Leslie
@mildura19 Hi mildura1. I'm sorry to hear about your experience. If you need further assistance with your booking, kindly send us a DM. Thanks - Chichi

@Sgturner1976 Hi Steven, I appreciate that you wanted to book a flight from Bali to Perth. As of the moment the next available flight will start on the 30th of January 2023. I recommend to always check our website for any updates here - https://t.co/nVkYpNIZfZ. Thanks - Vi

@Sgturner1976 Hi Steven, thanks for reaching out. I appreciate that you'd like to know when the January 2023 return flights from Bali to Perth be available. We're unable to guarantee this, however, our flights usually become available 9 months in advance. Thanks - Leslie
@EricaCampbell48 Hi Ericasbestlife. I understand your situation. We'd like to check this further for you. Kindly send us a DM with your full name and booking reference. Thanks - Chichi
@taxsarot Hi Alvaro, sorry to hear about your cancelled flight. We’d appreciate the chance to look into your options and assist. Would you mind sending us a DM? Thanks - Leslie

@Tex_frasercole Hi, I understand how upsetting it can be when you've made plans in advance and the flight got cancelled. If you require assistance with your booking, we’d be happy to help – feel free to send us a DM. Thanks – Leslie

@odnotblue Hi Delta, we know how inconvenient delayed or cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. If you need further assistance with your booking, you can send us a DM. Thanks - Chichi

@Liiiiizzzzz Hi Liz, thanks for reaching out. You can check your voucher details on our voucher balance portal here - https://t.co/yCa3RqkX6k. Alternatively, you can send us a DM so we check this further for you. Thanks - Jaya
@ARZUAYAZ11 Hi Arzu, sorry to hear you’re not happy with your Holidays Package. You can contact the Holidays team directly here - https://t.co/YFmU3bPhWn. Thanks - Kauri

urls.title: Contact Us | Jetstar Holidays
urls.description: Visit our customer service page to get in touch via email, call or request a callback.

data.text: @thiccbutdumb Hi Pop, I understand how serious and upsetting this situation must be for you. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Jen

@SamDavison42 Hi Sam, our team are always open to new ideas and we evaluate our schedules all the time to see how we can improve. Keep an eye on the website here - https://t.co/u5c1taoJvf for more flights availability. Thanks - Jaya

@embee113 2/2 Our check-in staff are always on hand at the airport to make sure that young children are seated with a parent or guardian on the day of travel. If you require assistance with your booking now, we’d be happy to help – feel free to send us a DM. Thanks – Jaya

data.text: @embee113 1/2 Hi @embee113, sorry for this inconvenience. Our booking systems are designed to seat people travelling together in the same row – but if other customers have pre-booked seat allocations, there are times when only separate seats are available.

data.text: @brufusmum Hi Bekah, I understand how serious and upsetting this situation must be for you and your Mum-in-law. We do our best to avoid making changes to our schedules unless it’s absolutely necessary. Feel free to send us a DM so we can discuss your options and assist. Thanks - Jaya
@just_gen Hi Genna, we’re usually very proud of the customer service our team deliver, so we’d like to look into this further. If you could send us a DM, we can get that started. – Jaya

@OzPerfumeJunkie Hi Portia, thanks for reaching out. I know this is a difficult situation for you and we hope your husband to have a speedy recovery. If you need to discuss a specific booking, you can send us a DM. Thanks. -Kauri

@victory_tigers1 Hi Cris, I'm sorry to hear about your delayed flight. We do our best to avoid making changes to our schedules unless it’s absolutely necessary. Feel free to send us a DM so we can discuss your options and assist. Thanks - Jaya
@symonmcc Hi Symon. Sorry to hear about your cancelled flight. Could you send us a DM of your booking details? We'd be happy to assist you with the options. Thanks - Bree

@emiIycrawford Hi Emily, sorry to hear about what happened. We’re usually proud of the experience our team provides to our customers, so we'd like to look into this further. Could you please DM us so we can assist? – Kauri

@_heleali Hi @_heleali, thanks for reaching out. Yes, you can check in 2 or more bags with the total combined weight of your check-in baggage allowance. You can check more info here - https://t.co/V31rsfJlZe. Thanks - Jaya

urls.title: Checked baggage | Size and weight restrictions | Jetstar
urls.description: Your comprehensive reference to the size and weight restrictions for checked baggage on Jetstar domestic and international flights.

data.text: @nathan_warner Hi Nathan, sorry to hear that you are having trouble changing your flights online. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Dan

@RahulPrasad74 Hi Rahul. We’re so glad Alex was on-hand to help make your daughter's booking with us a great one. We’ll definitely pass on the feedback. :) Please delete the booking reference though, we advise passengers not to post this publicly for privacy purposes. Thanks - Chichi

@acglm5 Hi Angela, Passengers need to comply with any state gov't or other requirements. Please ensure you check the latest government travel reqs for your origin and destination, which may include mandatory health declarations, vaccinations, entry permits, and such. Thanks - Norine

@ezratphansen Hi Ezra, thanks for reaching out. I understand that you would like to confirm your flight schedule. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking details? I appreciate the chance to look into this. Thanks. -Kauri

@miss_katemac Hi Kate, I’m sorry to hear this. I see you’ve been allocated a Case Manager who is currently investigating your feedback. I’ve asked that they get back to you as soon as possible. However we are experiencing high volume right now so we appreciate your patience. Thanks – Chichi

@LOLAAYUMI Hi Lola, sorry to hear that you haven't received an update. Please be assured that your feedback is being handled at the highest level within Jetstar, we are unable to provide further updates via social media. Any request must be done via your Case Manager directly. Thanks - Dan

data.text: @JMThompson95 Hi Jake, we’re so glad Patrick was on-hand to help make your mom's experience with us a great one. We’ll definitely pass on the feedback (I’m sure it’ll make his day!). Thanks - Vi

@allrite Hi there. Sorry to hear about this. We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. If you need further assistance with your booking, kindly send us a DM. Thanks - Chichi
@mxrganjade Hi @mxrganjade, sorry to hear that you can't select your seats online. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Jen

@sundayteleed Hi Mick, sorry to hear that. We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Could you please send us a DM with your booking details so we can look into your options and assist? - Leslie

@prazner Hi Brenden, we have a special policy in place to assist our customers affected by the floods who have imminent travel booked, including the option to move their flight free of charge or credit voucher. If you require assistance with a booking, feel free to DM us. Thanks - Jen
@sineadmoriarty6 Hi @sineadmoriarty6, we’d love the chance to chat with you about this and see what we can do. Could you please us a DM with more info? Thanks- Jen
@JustDaveThanks Hi David, I understand that it's upsetting having a delayed flight and I hope we can get you on your way soon. Feel free to DM us if you require further assistance. Thanks - Jay

@2019wuji Hi @2019wuji, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We'd appreciate a chance to look into your flight options. Thanks- Jen

@BronzeVibin Hi @BronzeVibin, I'm sorry to hear about your cancelled flight. We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Jay
@RadelaideSA Hi Radelaide, I'm sorry to hear your flight got cancelled. Would you mind sending us a DM here? We’d love the chance to chat with you about this and see what we can do. Thanks - Norine

@yeahSBK Hi Stella, I'm unable to give you exact info on when we are resuming TT flights but you can refer to our Travel Alerts page to check the availability of flights from time to time. Our Travel Alerts is updated regularly with further info - https://t.co/B76B2Gg0IM. Thanks - Norine

@AEDWILKEN Hi there, I appreciate you reaching us out. I understand how upsetting this situation must be for you. If you wishes to book a flight you can check our deals here - https://t.co/nVkYpNIZfZ. Feel free to send us a DM if you need any assistance. Thanks - Vi
@thespecialbka Hi Kent, sorry to hear about the delay in your refund. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into your refund status. Thanks – Jen
@Jolly13181 Hey Julius. Just go to our tweeter profile - Tap the envelope icon, next is to tap the message icon to create a new message. Hope that helps. Thanks - Dan

@sammiedude88 Hi Sam, thanks fore reaching out. Once booking is confirmed, we can no longer add passenger or a flight. If you need to discuss a specific booking just send us a DM, we’d love the chance to chat to you about this and see what we can do. Thanks - Dan

@Jolly13181 Hi Julius, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We'd be happy to assist you with your options. Thanks - Bree

@GeoGShore Hi Robert, sorry to hear about your cancelled flight. We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. – Jaya

@cassy9613 Hi Cassy, thanks for reaching out. I understand how upsetting it can be when the weather interferes with your travel plans. If you would like to explore alternative options, you can send us a DM and we'd be happy to assist you there. Thanks - Vi

@bradccarle Hi Brad, thanks for reaching out. You can change your booking later on if you're going to purchase a Business Class and there will be no change fee that will apply, only fare difference. You can check more about our Fare rules here - https://t.co/u02txIrLnT. Thanks. -Kauri
@walnutpal Hi @walnutpal, I understand that you would like to confirm the departure time of your flight from Hobart. To assist, would you mind sending us a DM? Thanks. - Kauri
@BigSammyL Hi Sam, I'm sorry our system isn't making this easy for you!  Could you please send us a DM with more info? We'd love to assist you in allocating your seat. Thanks- Jen

@amMaterialistic Hey Angie, great to hear that you'll be watching the concert. There're still seats available to book from Sydney to Melbourne(Tullamarine/Avalon) on 04 Mar 2022. You may check it here: https://t.co/lIMyS0Pe2m. Thanks - Jay

data.text: @thex57 Hi @thex57, sorry to hear about what happened. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Kauri
@thex57 Hi there, I understand how upsetting it can be to pay more for a flight. If you require any assistance with your booking, please DM us and we’d be happy to help. Thanks – Vi

@vagdhan Hi there, I'm sorry to hear your flight has been cancelled. I understand how upsetting this situation must be for you. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Vi

@vishal_zala Hi Vishal, we recommend that you check with the relevant government authority - both origin and destination to confirm what specific requirements are needed prior to travelling. You can also check our website for more info here - https://t.co/L6EYvSGXP2. Thanks - Leslie

data.text: @carlrossborough Hi Carl, I appreciate your frustration. Our prices are subject to change. Sometimes sold-out fares become available when a customer cancels their booking and the sold-out fare becomes available again and prices lower. Feel free to DM us here for further assistance. Thanks -Norine

@aynrant3 That’s not the standard we set for our aircraft, @aynrant3 – thanks for letting us know. We’ve passed this on to our cleaners. Hopefully, your next Jetstar flight is up to scratch. Thanks - Leslie
@_marty_k Hi Marty, we'd like to look into this and see what we can do. Could you please send us a DM so we can assist further? Thanks - Leslie

@_marty_k Sorry for the inconvenience Marty – the website is back up and running at the moment. Did you want to send us a DM in the meantime? We'd be happy to check this further and assist you with your booking. Thanks - Jaya
@_marty_k Hi Marty, sorry to hear you’re having trouble accessing your account. We recommend clearing your cookies and cache, then trying again. Thanks – Leslie
@Cambo_Victory Hi @Cambo_Victory, sorry to hear about your recent customer service experience. We’d like to look into this further. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? Thanks - Jaya

@Hut3Boy Hi Russell, We’re so glad our staff was on-hand to help make your experience a great one. Thanks for letting us know! We’ll definitely pass on the feedback (I’m sure they’ll be stoked to hear it.) - Norine

@OkOkLiv_ Hi @OkOkLiv_, I know this is sad for you. I hear you! Our team are always open to new ideas and we evaluate our schedules all the time to see how we can improve. We'll be sure to pass your feedback on :) - Norine

@Brad_Eveleigh Hi Brad, thanks for reaching out. Currently, we do not have direct flights from Sydney to Mackay yet. However, we are evaluating our schedules all the time to see how we can improve. Once a flight will be added, it will immediately be available to our website. Thanks - Kauri

data.text: @EkaChandraSeti3 Hi Eka, thanks for reaching out. You can find the list of our contact numbers here -- https://t.co/zQVILLUnEZ. Feel free to send us a DM here if you need further assistance. - Norine

urls.title: Contact numbers | Jetstar
urls.description: Need someone to speak to? Take a look at our list of contacts to find the number that is most relevant to your location. View contact numbers now.

data.text: @iamsal Hi Sal, Clearly, this is important for you. If your flights are holiday booking, our Holidays Team is the best place to assist with. However, we're happy to check this further for you. Feel free to send us a DM here if you need further assistance. Thanks - Norine
@dolloppy Sorry to hear you’re having trouble accessing our website Dolloppy. It may help if you clear the cache and cookies saved in your browser. Thanks – Dan

@dolloppy Hi Dolloppy, Not all flights on all days are on sale and some are selling out quite quickly due to the high demand. You could check the sale page for a different route or date and try again. Thanks - Norine

@sschospitality Sorry about the inconvenience Sschospitality – the website is back up and running and there’s plenty of $22 fares still available. I’d recommend clearing your cookies/cache first and then jump back on to grab a deal - https://t.co/8WtJLqoguR (NZ). Thanks – Dan

@lemiem Hi lemiem, sorry to hear you’re having trouble with the website. The website is back up and running and there are still plenty of $22 fares still available. I’d suggest clearing your cache first and then hop back on to grab a deal - https://t.co/Wy4gkX72cA Thanks - Norine

@StackTodd Hi Todd, sorry for the inconvenience. With the increase in visitors, our site experienced some struggling. However, the website is back up and running and there are plenty of $22 fares still available. I’d recommend clearing your cookies/cache first. Thanks. -Kauri

@luc_alavoine Sorry about the inconvenience Luc – the website is back up and running and there’s plenty of $22 fares still available. I’d recommend clearing your cookies/cache first and then jump back on to grab a deal - https://t.co/Wy4gkX72cA (AU). Thanks – Dan

@LaHayeallday24 Hi @LaHayeallday24, I'm sorry to hear about what happened to your flight. We do our best to avoid making changes to our schedules unless it’s absolutely necessary. Feel free to send us a DM so we can discuss your options and assist. Thanks - Kauri
@3point1miles Hi, thanks for reaching out and I’m sorry to hear your mother is unwell.  Can you please send us a DM with your full name and booking reference number? We’d like to assist. Thanks – Vi

@whoisluanak Hi @whoisluanak, I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change. We do our best to avoid making changes to our schedules unless it’s absolutely necessary. Feel free to send us a DM so we can discuss your options and assist. Thanks - Jaya
@Anthsworld Hi Anthony, I'm sorry to hear about what happened. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Kauri
@CrockettColburn Hey Colburn! Glad to hear that you'd like to fly with us again. Kindly check the website from to time for updates with available flights. Thanks - Chichi
@CrockettColburn Hi there. We’re having some problems with our site – but we’re working on it! Did you want to send us a DM in the meantime? We can help you with your booking there. Thanks - Vi
@agust_yoonji Hi there. I'm sorry to hear about the changes to your flight. If you require any assistance with your booking, please DM us and we’d be happy to help. Thanks – Vi
@MLoParis Hi there, we’re having some problems with our site – but we’re working on it! Did you want to send us a DM in the meantime? We can help you with your booking there. Thanks - Vi
@cambridgebear Hi Claire, we’re having some problems with our site – but we’re working on it! Did you want to send us a DM in the meantime? We can help you with your booking there. Thanks - Vi

@DallasSmith666 Hi. I'm sorry to hear about this. We've had issues recently at the website that has been reported already. If you still need assistance with your booking, kindly send us a DM. Thanks - Chichi

@GamerGirlGemma1 Hi Gemma. We’re usually very proud of the customer service our team deliver and I'm sorry this was not your experience. If you still need further assistance, you can send us a DM. Thanks - Chichi
@brendan_trew Hi Brendan, thanks for reaching us out. Would you mind sending us a DM so we can check this further? Thanks - Vi

@TomWatt91 Hi Tom. I appreciate that you wish to book a flight to Perth however, our schedule will remain suspended until the end of March. As the border restrictions continue to evolve, we are evaluating our schedules all the time. You can read more here - https://t.co/RMJiyvjsvJ. -Kauri
